name: Woodlands of Ireland Project
memberOrga: Woodlands of Ireland does not have a requirement for members or member organisations but has a database of over 1300 Supporters. This database is not publicly accessible due to GDPR
goal:
Woodlands of Ireland is an inclusive, membership organisation dedicated to native woodlands. The primary objectives of Woodlands of Ireland are:

- to generate awareness of native woodlands amongst policy makers and the general public
- to develop projects and sustainable management strategies aimed at ensuring the future viability of native woodlands
euInitiatives: All policy and legislation relevant to native woodlands, i.e. The Habitats Directive, The Birds Directive, Water Framework Directive and Appropriate Assessment Directive.
